title: "Luum’s AI-based Lash Robot can delicately extend eyelashes for customers in beauty salons"
excerpt: "Luum has created an AI-based Lash Robot that can delicately extend eyelashes for customers in beauty salons. I’ll let you absorb that for a minute. Luum CEO Philippe Sanchez said in an interview with VentureBeat that the lash extension procedure is ideal for robotics because it’s a tedious job for humans,"
